name: Rabbids: Party of Legends
overview: The story describes that the crazy Rabbids once again traveled back and forth through time and space. This time they broke into the world of Journey to the West and became the Tang Sanzang and Sun Wukong. , Zhu Bajie and Sha Wujing mentoring four-person group. The scenes in the game are presented in an oriental style, and various games will test the player's reaction, memory and so on.
